comments:
Description:
ClassCastException when using attached dynamic text event handler
Build number:2.1.3.v200707032108

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a dynamic text.
2. create a data source(jdbc:oracle:thin:@spmdb:1521:test)
3. create a data set using the data source(query: select * from orders)
4. Bind the dynamic text to the data set
5. Map it to attached TextData1Impl.class
6. Preview in Layout

Expected result:
Display "Approved for shipment" with margin style and no Exception.

Actual result:
ClassCastException.

Error log:
The following items have errors: 


Text (id = 3): 
- Unhandled exception when executing script 
Error.UnhandledScriptError ( 1 time(s) )
